cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on October 26, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4349, Department of Homeland Security Office for Civil Rights and Civil Liberties Authorization Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 116 (Friday, July 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Texas:
H.R. 4349.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3606]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Department of Homeland Security Office for Civil Rights and Civil Liberties Authorization Act
